prompt: make a pokemon card trading game with images and option to battle with friends using light theme
refinedPrompt: Create a Pokémon card trading game website with a light color scheme. Include high-quality images of Pokémon cards, a user-friendly interface for trading cards with other players, and a feature to battle against friends using the collected cards. Implement a secure authentication system for user accounts and a leaderboard to display top players. Optimize the website for both desktop and mobile devices.
